dsOverview.title: Global Air Temperature and Precipitation Climatologies, by Willmott et al.

summary.p: Cort J. Willmott, Kenji Matsuura and David R. Legates (Center for Climate Research, University of Deleware), created a new version of this dataset (version 2.01) in November 1998. You may find more recent data at the Willmott site.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: UDEL/GEOG/CCR > Center For Climate Research, Department of Geography, University of Delaware

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Temperature > Air Temperature
EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Precipitation > Precipitation Amount

reference.title: Mean seasonal and spatial variability in gauge corrected, global precipitation
Smart Interpolation of Annually Averaged Air Temperature in the United States
